Proje Konsepti
Kendi kurallarınızı belirleyerek geliştireceğiniz, hafıza temelli eğlenceli bir sayı eşleme
oyunu!
Kartlara dokunarak eşleşen sayıları bulmaya çalışıyorsunuz – hem öğrenip hem
eğleneceğiz

Anasayfa
●
●
●
●
Üç buton olacak: Başla, Skorlarım, Ayarlar
“Başla”
→ Oyun kurma sayfasına geçiş
“Skorlarım”
→ Daha önceki skorların listelendiği sayfa
“Ayarlar”
→ Tema ve diğer ayarların olduğu sayfa
⚙ Oyun Kurma Ekranı
●
●
Kullanıcıdan kullanıcı adı ve zorluk derecesi (Kolay/Zor) bilgisini alıyoruz
Kurallar:
○
○
○
Her sayıdan 2 tane olacak
Sayılar 1–100 arasında
Kolay: 16 kart (8 farklı sayı)
○
Zor: 24 kart (12 farklı sayı)
 Oyun Ekranı
●
●
●
●
●
●
●
Kartlar rastgele dağıtılacak ve başlangıçta kapalı olacak
Bir karta tıkladığınızda animasyonla açılacak ve sayıyı gösterecek
En fazla aynı anda iki kart açık kalabilecek
Eşleşirse: Kartlar yeşile döner ve açık kalır
Eşleşmezse: Kısa bir beklemenin ardından kapanır
Sol üstte skor, sağ üstte kalan süre (60 saniyeden geri sayıyor)
Oyun sonunda:
○
○
Tüm kartlar eşleşirse → Tebrik mesajı ve skor kaydetme seçeneği
Süre biterse → Kaybettiğinizi belirten mesaj ve tekrar oynama seçeneği
 Skorlarım Ekranı
●
●
●
Daha önceki skorlarınızı listeler
En yüksekten en düşüğe sıralı
Sıra numarası, kullanıcı adı ve skor bilgisi
⚙ Ayarlar Ekranı
●
●
●
Açık ve koyu tema arasında geçiş
Skor listesini sıfırlama
Oyun süresini açıp kapatma

[file] app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/repository/MainRepository.kt (98B, 3 lines) - Tem 24, 2025 09:04 ÖÖ"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Şimdi belirttiğin gereksinimlere göre hafıza oyunu için profesyonel bir yapı oluşturacağım. DTO'lar, domain modelleri ve mapper'ları içerecek Clean Architecture yaklaşımı kullanacağım.

Önce data layer'da DTO modellerini oluşturalım:

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/data/dto/GameScoreDto.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.dto

import kotlinx.serialization.Serializable

@Serializable
data class GameScoreDto(
 val id: String = "",
 val playerName: String = "",
 val score: Int = 0,
 val difficulty: String = "EASY", // EASY or HARD
 val gameTime: Long = 0L, // Oyun süresi (saniye)
 val completedTime: Long = 0L, // Tamamlanma süresi (saniye)
 val timestamp: Long = System.currentTimeMillis(),
 val isCompleted: Boolean = false
)
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/data/dto/GameSettingsDto.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.dto

import kotlinx.serialization.Serializable

@Serializable
data class GameSettingsDto(
 val id: String = "game_settings",
 val isDarkTheme: Boolean = false,
 val isTimerEnabled: Boolean = true,
 val gameTimeLimit: Int = 60, // saniye
 val lastPlayerName: String = ""
)
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/data/dto/GameCardDto.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.dto

import kotlinx.serialization.Serializable

@Serializable
data class GameCardDto(
 val id: String = "",
 val number: Int = 0,
 val isFlipped: Boolean = false,
 val isMatched: Boolean = false,
 val position: Int = 0
)
```

Şimdi domain modellerini oluşturalım:

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameScore.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

data class GameScore(
 val id: String,
 val playerName: String,
 val score: Int,
 val difficulty: GameDifficulty,
 val gameTime: Long,
 val completedTime: Long,
 val timestamp: Long,
 val isCompleted: Boolean
)
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameSettings.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

data class GameSettings(
 val isDarkTheme: Boolean,
 val isTimerEnabled: Boolean,
 val gameTimeLimit: Int,
 val lastPlayerName: String
)
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameCard.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

data class GameCard(
 val id: String,
 val number: Int,
 val isFlipped: Boolean,
 val isMatched: Boolean,
 val position: Int
)
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameDifficulty.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

enum class GameDifficulty(val cardCount: Int, val uniqueNumbers: Int) {
 EASY(16, 8),
 HARD(24, 12)
}
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameState.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

data class GameState(
 val cards: List<GameCard>,
 val score: Int,
 val timeRemaining: Int,
 val flippedCards: List<GameCard>,
 val isGameCompleted: Boolean,
 val isGameOver: Boolean,
 val playerName: String,
 val difficulty: GameDifficulty
)
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameResult.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

sealed class GameResult {
 data object InProgress : GameResult()
 data class Completed(val finalScore: Int, val timeUsed: Long) : GameResult()
 data object TimeUp : GameResult()
}
```

Şimdi mapper dosyasını oluşturalım:

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/data/mapper/GameMappers.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper

import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.dto.GameCardDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.dto.GameScoreDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.dto.GameSettingsDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameCard
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameDifficulty
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameScore
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameSettings

// GameScore Mappers
fun GameScoreDto.toDomain(): GameScore {
 return GameScore(
 id = id,
 playerName = playerName,
 score = score,
 difficulty = when (difficulty) {
 "HARD" -> GameDifficulty.HARD
 else -> GameDifficulty.EASY
 },
 gameTime = gameTime,
 completedTime = completedTime,
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted
 )
}

fun GameScore.toDto(): GameScoreDto {
 return GameScoreDto(
 id = id,
 playerName = playerName,
 score = score,
 difficulty = difficulty.name,
 gameTime = gameTime,
 completedTime = completedTime,
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted
 )
}

fun List<GameScoreDto>.toDomainList(): List<GameScore> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameScore>.toDtoList(): List<GameScoreDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// GameSettings Mappers
fun GameSettingsDto.toDomain(): GameSettings {
 return GameSettings(
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme,
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled,
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName
 )
}

fun GameSettings.toDto(): GameSettingsDto {
 return GameSettingsDto(
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme,
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled,
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName
 )
}

// GameCard Mappers
fun GameCardDto.toDomain(): GameCard {
 return GameCard(
 id = id,
 number = number,
 isFlipped = isFlipped,
 isMatched = isMatched,
 position = position
 )
}

fun GameCard.toDto(): GameCardDto {
 return GameCardDto(
 id = id,
 number = number,
 isFlipped = isFlipped,
 isMatched = isMatched,
 position = position
 )
}

fun List<GameCardDto>.toCardDomainList(): List<GameCard> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameCard>.toCardDtoList(): List<GameCardDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// Game Creation Helper
fun createGameCards(difficulty: GameDifficulty): List<GameCard> {
 val numbers = (1..100).shuffled().take(difficulty.uniqueNumbers)
 val doubledNumbers = (numbers + numbers).shuffled()
 
 return doubledNumbers.mapIndexed { index, number ->
 GameCard(
 id = "card_$index",
 number = number,
 isFlipped = false,
 isMatched = false,
 position = index
 )
 }
}

// Score Calculation Helper
fun calculateScore(
 matchedPairs: Int,
 timeUsed: Long,
 difficulty: GameDifficulty,
 totalTime: Int
): Int {
 val baseScore = matchedPairs * 100
 val timeBonus = ((totalTime - timeUsed) * 2).coerceAtLeast(0)
 val difficultyMultiplier = when (difficulty) {
 GameDifficulty.EASY -> 1.0
 GameDifficulty.HARD -> 1.5
 }
 
 return ((baseScore + timeBonus) * difficultyMultiplier).toInt()
}
```

Ek olarak oyun mekaniklerini desteklemek için birkaç utility class ekleyelim:

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameConfig.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

object GameConfig {
 const val DEFAULT_GAME_TIME = 60
 const val CARD_FLIP_DELAY = 1000L
 const val MATCH_ANIMATION_DURATION = 500L
 const val SCORE_PER_MATCH = 100
 const val TIME_BONUS_MULTIPLIER = 2
 
 // Genişletilebilir ayarlar
 const val ENABLE_SOUND_EFFECTS = true
 const val ENABLE_HAPTIC_FEEDBACK = true
 const val AUTO_SAVE_PROGRESS = true
}
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/domain/model/GameEvent.kt
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model

sealed class GameEvent {
 data class CardFlipped(val cardId: String) : GameEvent()
 data class CardsMatched(val cardIds: List<String>) : GameEvent()
 data class CardsUnmatched(val cardIds: List<String>) : GameEvent()
 data object GameCompleted : GameEvent()
 data object GameTimeUp : GameEvent()
 data object GamePaused : GameEvent()
 data object GameResumed : GameEvent()
 data class ScoreSaved(val score: GameScore) : GameEvent()
}
```

Bu yapı sayesinde:

1. **Temiz mimari**: DTO'lar veri katmanında, domain modelleri iş mantığında kullanılıyor
2. **Tip güvenliği**: Enum'lar ve sealed class'larla güvenli state yönetimi
3. **Genişletilebilirlik**: Yeni özellikler kolayca eklenebilir
4. **Test edilebilirlik**: Her katman bağımsız test edilebilir
5. **Firestore uyumluluğu**: DTO'lar serialization için hazır

İstersen bu temel yapıya ek özellikler de ekleyebiliriz:
- Oyun istatistikleri (ortalama süre, en iyi skor vb.)
- Başarım sistemi (achievements)
- Multiplayer desteği
- Farklı oyun modları
- Animasyon state'leri

Hangi özelliklerle devam etmek istiyorsun?"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

object Constants {

 const val MATCH_ANIMATION_DURATION = 500L
 const val SCORE_PER_MATCH = 100
 const val TIME_BONUS_MULTIPLIER = 2

 // Genişletilebilir ayarlar
 const val ENABLE_SOUND_EFFECTS = true
 const val ENABLE_HAPTIC_FEEDBACK = true
 const val AUTO_SAVE_PROGRESS = true
}

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/data/mapper/toDomain.kt, lines=ALL(1-129)
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper

import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameCardDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameScoreDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameSettingsDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameCard
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameDifficulty
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameScore
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameSettings

// GameScore Mappers
fun GameScoreDto.toDomain(): GameScore {
 return GameScore(
 id = id,
 playerName = playerName,
 score = score,
 difficulty = when (difficulty) {
 "HARD" -> GameDifficulty.HARD
 else -> GameDifficulty.EASY
 },
 gameTime = gameTime,
 completedTime = completedTime,
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted
 )
}

fun GameScore.toDto(): GameScoreDto {
 return GameScoreDto(
 id = id,
 playerName = playerName,
 score = score,
 difficulty = difficulty.name,
 gameTime = gameTime,
 completedTime = completedTime,
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted
 )
}

fun List<GameScoreDto>.toDomainList(): List<GameScore> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameScore>.toDtoList(): List<GameScoreDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// GameSettings Mappers
fun GameSettingsDto.toDomain(): GameSettings {
 return GameSettings(
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme,
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled,
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName
 )
}

fun GameSettings.toDto(): GameSettingsDto {
 return GameSettingsDto(
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme,
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled,
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName
 )
}

// GameCard Mappers
fun GameCardDto.toDomain(): GameCard {
 return GameCard(
 id = id,
 number = number,
 isFlipped = isFlipped,
 isMatched = isMatched,
 position = position
 )
}

fun GameCard.toDto(): GameCardDto {
 return GameCardDto(
 id = id,
 number = number,
 isFlipped = isFlipped,
 isMatched = isMatched,
 position = position
 )
}

fun List<GameCardDto>.toCardDomainList(): List<GameCard> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameCard>.toCardDtoList(): List<GameCardDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// Game Creation Helper
fun createGameCards(difficulty: GameDifficulty): List<GameCard> {
 val numbers = (1..100).shuffled().take(difficulty.uniqueNumbers)
 val doubledNumbers = (numbers + numbers).shuffled()
 
 return doubledNumbers.mapIndexed { index, number ->
 GameCard(
 id = "card_$index",
 number = number,
 isFlipped = false,
 isMatched = false,
 position = index
 )
 }
}

// Score Calculation Helper
fun calculateScore(
 matchedPairs: Int,
 timeUsed: Long,
 difficulty: GameDifficulty,
 totalTime: Int
): Int {
 val baseScore = matchedPairs * 100
 val timeBonus = ((totalTime - timeUsed) * 2).coerceAtLeast(0)
 val difficultyMultiplier = when (difficulty) {
 GameDifficulty.EASY -> 1.0
 GameDifficulty.HARD -> 1.5
 }
 
 return ((baseScore + timeBonus) * difficultyMultiplier).toInt()
}

```

+package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.repository
 
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.Resource
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDomain
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDomainList
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDto
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.source.GameScoreDataSource
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameScore
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.repository.GameScoreRepository
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.map
+import javax.inject.Inject
+
+class GameScoreRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
+ private val dataSource: GameScoreDataSource
+) : GameScoreRepository {
+
+ override suspend fun saveScore(gameScore: GameScore): Resource<String> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.saveScore(gameScore.toDto())
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(result.getOrThrow())
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun getAllScores(): Resource<List<GameScore>> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.getAllScores()
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(result.getOrThrow().toDomainList())
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun getTopScores(limit: Int): Resource<List<GameScore>> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.getTopScores(limit)
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(result.getOrThrow().toDomainList())
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun deleteScore(scoreId: String): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.deleteScore(scoreId)
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(Unit)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun clearAllScores(): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.clearAllScores()
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(Unit)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override fun getScoresFlow(): Flow<Resource<List<GameScore>>> {
+ return dataSource.getScoresFlow()
+ .map { dtoList ->
+ try {
+ Resource.Success(dtoList.toDomainList())
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}

+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.repository.GameSettingsRepository
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.map
+import javax.inject.Inject
+
+class GameSettingsRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
+ private val dataSource: GameSettingsDataSource
+) : GameSettingsRepository {
+
+ override suspend fun saveSettings(settings: GameSettings): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.saveSettings(settings.toDto())
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(Unit)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun getSettings(): Resource<GameSettings> {
+ return try {
+ val result = dataSource.getSettings()
+ if (result.isSuccess) {
+ Resource.Success(result.getOrThrow().toDomain())
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error(result.exceptionOrNull()?.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override fun getSettingsFlow(): Flow<Resource<GameSettings>> {
+ return dataSource.getSettingsFlow()
+ .map { dto ->
+ try {
+ Resource.Success(dto.toDomain())
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun updateTheme(isDarkTheme: Boolean): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val currentSettings = getSettings()
+ if (currentSettings is Resource.Success) {
+ val updatedSettings = currentSettings.data!!.copy(isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme)
+ saveSettings(updatedSettings)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error("Failed to get current settings")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun updateTimerEnabled(isEnabled: Boolean): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val currentSettings = getSettings()
+ if (currentSettings is Resource.Success) {
+ val updatedSettings = currentSettings.data!!.copy(isTimerEnabled = isEnabled)
+ saveSettings(updatedSettings)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error("Failed to get current settings")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun updateGameTimeLimit(timeLimit: Int): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val currentSettings = getSettings()
+ if (currentSettings is Resource.Success) {
+ val updatedSettings = currentSettings.data!!.copy(gameTimeLimit = timeLimit)
+ saveSettings(updatedSettings)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error("Failed to get current settings")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun updateLastPlayerName(playerName: String): Resource<Unit> {
+ return try {
+ val currentSettings = getSettings()
+ if (currentSettings is Resource.Success) {
+ val updatedSettings = currentSettings.data!!.copy(lastPlayerName = playerName)
+ saveSettings(updatedSettings)
+ } else {
+ Resource.Error("Failed to get current settings")
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Resource.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error")
+ }
+ }
+}
```

gameState.timeRemaining,\n difficulty = gameState.difficulty,\n totalTime = 60\n )\n \n val isGameCompleted = newMatchedPairs == gameState.difficulty.uniqueNumbers\n \n return gameState.copy(\n cards = matchedCards,\n flippedCards = emptyList(),\n matchedPairs = newMatchedPairs,\n score = newScore,\n totalMoves = newTotalMoves,\n isGameCompleted = isGameCompleted\n )\n }\n }\n \n return gameState.copy(\n cards = updatedCards,\n flippedCards = newFlippedCards,\n totalMoves = newTotalMoves\n )\n }\n \n fun closeUnmatchedCards(gameState: GameState): GameState {\n val updatedCards = gameState.cards.map { card ->\n if (card.isFlipped && !card.isMatched) {\n card.copy(isFlipped = false)\n } else card\n }\n \n return gameState.copy(\n cards = updatedCards,\n flippedCards = emptyList()\n )\n }\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_01PrA1sumiw9yvNQVAwhikDr","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
@@ -1,1 +1,85 @@
+package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.usecase
 
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.calculateScore
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameState
+import javax.inject.Inject
+
+class FlipCardUseCase @Inject constructor() {
+
+ operator fun invoke(gameState: GameState, cardId: String): GameState {
+ val cardToFlip = gameState.cards.find { it.id == cardId }
+ ?: return gameState
+
+ // Kart zaten açık veya eşleşmiş ise işlem yapma
+ if (cardToFlip.isFlipped || cardToFlip.isMatched) {
+ return gameState
+ }
+
+ // İki kart açık ise işlem yapma
+ if (gameState.flippedCards.size >= 2) {
+ return gameState
+ }
+
+ val updatedCards = gameState.cards.map { card ->
+ if (card.id == cardId) {
+ card.copy(isFlipped = true)
+ } else card
+ }
+
+ val newFlippedCards = gameState.flippedCards + cardToFlip.copy(isFlipped = true)
+ val newTotalMoves = gameState.totalMoves + 1
+
+ // İki kart açıldıysa eşleşme kontrolü
+ if (newFlippedCards.size == 2) {
+ val firstCard = newFlippedCards[0]
+ val secondCard = newFlippedCards[1]
+
+ if (firstCard.number == secondCard.number) {
+ // Eşleşme var
+ val matchedCards = updatedCards.map { card ->
+ if (card.id == firstCard.id || card.id == secondCard.id) {
+ card.copy(isMatched = true, isFlipped = true)
+ } else card
+ }
+
+ val newMatchedPairs = gameState.matchedPairs + 1
+ val newScore = calculateScore(
+ matchedPairs = newMatchedPairs,
+ timeUsed = 60L - gameState.timeRemaining,
+ difficulty = gameState.difficulty,
+ totalTime = 60
+ )
+
+ val isGameCompleted = newMatchedPairs == gameState.difficulty.uniqueNumbers
+
+ return gameState.copy(
+ cards = matchedCards,
+ flippedCards = emptyList(),
+ matchedPairs = newMatchedPairs,
+ score = newScore,
+ totalMoves = newTotalMoves,
+ isGameCompleted = isGameCompleted
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ return gameState.copy(
+ cards = updatedCards,
+ flippedCards = newFlippedCards,
+ totalMoves = newTotalMoves
+ )
+ }
+
+ fun closeUnmatchedCards(gameState: GameState): GameState {
+ val updatedCards = gameState.cards.map { card ->
+ if (card.isFlipped && !card.isMatched) {
+ card.copy(isFlipped = false)
+ } else card
+ }
+
+ return gameState.copy(
+ cards = updatedCards,
+ flippedCards = emptyList()
+ )
+ }
+}
```

## ✅ Tamamlanan Yapılar:

### 1. **Data Layer (DTO & Mappers)**
- `GameScoreDto`, `GameSettingsDto`, `GameCardDto` - Nullable propertyler ile
- Güvenli extension fonksiyonlar (`orEmpty()`, `orZero()`, `orFalse()`, `orTrue()`)
- Professional mapper'lar ile güvenli dönüşümler

### 2. **Domain Layer (Models & Use Cases)**
- Domain modelleri: `GameScore`, `GameSettings`, `GameCard`, `GameState`
- Enum'lar: `GameDifficulty`, sealed class'lar: `GameResult`, `GameEvent`
- Use Case'ler: `CreateGameUseCase`, `FlipCardUseCase`, `SaveGameScoreUseCase`

### 3. **Repository Pattern**
- Interface'ler: `GameScoreRepository`, `GameSettingsRepository`
- Implementation'lar: `GameScoreRepositoryImpl`, `GameSettingsRepositoryImpl`
- Data Source interface'leri: `GameScoreDataSource`, `GameSettingsDataSource`

### 4. **Error Handling**
- `Resource<T>` sealed class ile unified response handling
- Null safety ile professional approach

## Yapının Avantajları:

1. **Testable**: Her katman bağımsız test edilebilir
2. **Maintainable**: Temiz kod prensipleri
3. **Scalable**: Yeni özellikler kolayca eklenebilir
4. **Safe**: Null safety ve error handling
5. **Professional**: Industry standartlarına uygun

+enum class FirebaseErrorCode(val code: String, val message: String) {
+ // Network Errors
+ NETWORK_ERROR("network-request-failed", "İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edin"),
+ TIMEOUT("timeout", "İşlem zaman aşımına uğradı"),
+ UNAVAILABLE("unavailable", "Servis şu anda kullanılamıyor"),
+
+ // Permission Errors
+ PERMISSION_DENIED("permission-denied", "Bu işlem için yetkiniz bulunmuyor"),
+ UNAUTHENTICATED("unauthenticated", "Oturum açmanız gerekiyor"),
+
+ // Data Errors
+ NOT_FOUND("not-found", "İstenen veri bulunamadı"),
+ ALREADY_EXISTS("already-exists", "Bu veri zaten mevcut"),
+ FAILED_PRECONDITION("failed-precondition", "İşlem koşulları sağlanamadı"),
+ OUT_OF_RANGE("out-of-range", "Veri aralık dışında"),
+ DATA_LOSS("data-loss", "Veri kaybı oluştu"),
+
+ // Resource Errors
+ RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED("resource-exhausted", "Kaynak limiti aşıldı"),
+ QUOTA_EXCEEDED("quota-exceeded", "Kullanım kotası aşıldı"),
+
+ // Internal Errors
+ INTERNAL("internal", "Sunucu hatası oluştu"),
+ UNKNOWN("unknown", "Bilinmeyen bir hata oluştu"),
+ INVALID_ARGUMENT("invalid-argument", "Geçersiz parametre"),
+ CANCELLED("cancelled", "İşlem iptal edildi"),
+ DEADLINE_EXCEEDED("deadline-exceeded", "İşlem zaman aşımına uğradı"),
+
+ // Custom App Errors
+ GAME_NOT_FOUND("game-not-found", "Oyun bulunamadı"),
+ SCORE_SAVE_FAILED("score-save-failed", "Skor kaydedilemedi"),
+ SETTINGS_LOAD_FAILED("settings-load-failed", "Ayarlar yüklenemedi"),
+ INVALID_GAME_STATE("invalid-game-state", "Geçersiz oyun durumu");
+
+ companion object {
+ fun fromCode(code: String?): FirebaseErrorCode {
+ return values().find { it.code == code } ?: UNKNOWN
+ }
+
+ fun getMessageByCode(code: String?): String {
+ return fromCode(code).message
+ }
+ }
+}
```

following changes to the file:

```
@@ -1,1 +1,124 @@
+package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common
 
+import com.google.firebase.FirebaseException
+import com.google.firebase.FirebaseNetworkException
+import com.google.firebase.FirebaseTooManyRequestsException
+import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestoreException
+import kotlinx.coroutines.TimeoutCancellationException
+import kotlinx.coroutines.withTimeout
+import java.io.IOException
+import java.net.UnknownHostException
+
+object SafeCall {
+
+ suspend fun <T> execute(
+ timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
+ operation: suspend () -> T
+ ): Resource<T> {
+ return try {
+ Resource.Loading()
+ val result = withTimeout(timeoutMillis) {
+ operation()
+ }
+ Resource.Success(result)
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ handleException(e)
+ }
+ }
+
+ fun <T> executeSync(operation: () -> T): Resource<T> {
+ return try {
+ val result = operation()
+ Resource.Success(result)
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ handleException(e)
+ }
+ }
+
+ private fun <T> handleException(exception: Exception): Resource.Error<T> {
+ return when (exception) {
+ // Firebase Specific Errors
+ is FirebaseFirestoreException -> {
+ val errorCode = mapFirestoreErrorCode(exception.code)
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = FirebaseErrorCode.getMessageByCode(errorCode.code),
+ errorCode = errorCode.code
+ )
+ }
+
+ is FirebaseNetworkException -> {
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
+ errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
+ )
+ }
+
+ is FirebaseTooManyRequestsException -> {
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message,
+ errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.code
+ )
+ }
+
+ is FirebaseException -> {
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
+ errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Network Errors
+ is UnknownHostException, is IOException -> {
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
+ errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Timeout Errors
+ is TimeoutCancellationException -> {
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.message,
+ errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.code
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Generic Errors
+ else -> {
+ Resource.Error(
+ message = exception.message ?: FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
+ errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ private fun mapFirestoreErrorCode(code: FirebaseFirestoreException.Code): FirebaseErrorCode {
+ return when (code) {
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.PERMISSION_DENIED -> FirebaseErrorCode.PERMISSION_DENIED
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.NOT_FOUND -> FirebaseErrorCode.NOT_FOUND
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.ALREADY_EXISTS -> FirebaseErrorCode.ALREADY_EXISTS
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.FAILED_PRECONDITION -> FirebaseErrorCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.OUT_OF_RANGE -> FirebaseErrorCode.OUT_OF_RANGE
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DATA_LOSS -> FirebaseErrorCode.DATA_LOSS
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED -> FirebaseErrorCode.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INTERNAL -> FirebaseErrorCode.INTERNAL
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT -> FirebaseErrorCode.INVALID_ARGUMENT
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.CANCELLED -> FirebaseErrorCode.CANCELLED
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED -> FirebaseErrorCode.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAUTHENTICATED -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAUTHENTICATED
+ FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAVAILABLE -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAVAILABLE
+ else -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+// Extension functions for easier usage
+suspend inline fun <T> safeCall(
+ timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
+ crossinline operation: suspend () -> T
+): Resource<T> = SafeCall.execute(timeoutMillis) { operation() }
+
+inline fun <T> safeCallSync(
+ crossinline operation: () -> T
+): Resource<T> = SafeCall.executeSync { operation() }
```

package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common

import com.google.firebase.FirebaseException
import com.google.firebase.FirebaseNetworkException
import com.google.firebase.FirebaseTooManyRequestsException
import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestoreException
import kotlinx.coroutines.TimeoutCancellationException
import kotlinx.coroutines.withTimeout
import java.io.IOException
import java.net.UnknownHostException

object SafeCall {

 suspend fun <T> execute(
 timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
 operation: suspend () -> T
 ): Resource<T> {
 return try {
 val result = withTimeout(timeoutMillis) {
 operation()
 }
 Resource.Success(result)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 handleException(e)
 }
 }

 fun <T> executeSync(operation: () -> T): Resource<T> {
 return try {
 val result = operation()
 Resource.Success(result)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 handleException(e)
 }
 }

 private fun <T> handleException(exception: Exception): Resource.Error<T> {
 return when (exception) {
 // Firebase Specific Errors
 is FirebaseFirestoreException -> {
 val errorCode = mapFirestoreErrorCode(exception.code)
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.getMessageByCode(errorCode.code),
 errorCode = errorCode.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseNetworkException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseTooManyRequestsException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
 )
 }

 // Network Errors
 is UnknownHostException, is IOException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
 )
 }

 // Timeout Errors
 is TimeoutCancellationException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.code
 )
 }

 // Generic Errors
 else -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = exception.message ?: FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
 )
 }
 }
 }

 private fun mapFirestoreErrorCode(code: FirebaseFirestoreException.Code): FirebaseErrorCode {
 return when (code) {
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.PERMISSION_DENIED -> FirebaseErrorCode.PERMISSION_DENIED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.NOT_FOUND -> FirebaseErrorCode.NOT_FOUND
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.ALREADY_EXISTS -> FirebaseErrorCode.ALREADY_EXISTS
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.FAILED_PRECONDITION -> FirebaseErrorCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.OUT_OF_RANGE -> FirebaseErrorCode.OUT_OF_RANGE
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DATA_LOSS -> FirebaseErrorCode.DATA_LOSS
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED -> FirebaseErrorCode.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INTERNAL -> FirebaseErrorCode.INTERNAL
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT -> FirebaseErrorCode.INVALID_ARGUMENT
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.CANCELLED -> FirebaseErrorCode.CANCELLED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED -> FirebaseErrorCode.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAUTHENTICATED -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAUTHENTICATED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAVAILABLE -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAVAILABLE
 else -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN
 }
 }
}

// Extension functions for easier usage
suspend inline fun <T> safeCall(
 timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
 crossinline operation: suspend () -> T
): Resource<T> = SafeCall.execute(timeoutMillis) { operation() }

inline fun <T> safeCallSync(
 crossinline operation: () -> T
): Resource<T> = SafeCall.executeSync { operation() }

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Mükemmel! Şimdi profesyonel error handling sistemimiz hazır. Özetleyecek olursak:

## ✅ Tamamlanan Error Handling Sistemi:

### 1. **Resource Class** - Enhanced
- `errorCode` field eklendi
- Loading, Success, Error states
- Firebase-specific error tracking

### 2. **FirebaseErrorCode Enum**
- Tüm Firebase error kodları
- Türkçe user-friendly mesajlar
- Custom app error'ları
- Helper methods (fromCode, getMessageByCode)

### 3. **SafeCall System**
- Timeout handling (30 saniye default)
- Firebase exception mapping
- Network error handling
- Automatic error code assignment
- Extension functions for easy usage

### 4. **Repository Layer**
- SafeCall integration
- Clean error propagation
- Simplified code structure
- Professional error handling

## Sistem Avantajları:

1. **User-Friendly**: Türkçe error mesajları
2. **Comprehensive**: Tüm Firebase error'ları covered
3. **Professional**: Industry-standard error handling
4. **Maintainable**: Centralized error management
5. **Timeout Protection**: Network timeout handling
6. **Type-Safe**: Compile-time error checking

## Usage Examples:

```kotlin
// Repository'de
override suspend fun saveScore(gameScore: GameScore): Resource<String> = safeCall {
 val result = dataSource.saveScore(gameScore.toDto())
 result.getOrThrow()
}

// UI'da error handling
when (result) {
 is Resource.Success -> // Success handling
 is Resource.Error -> {
 showError(result.message) // "İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edin"
 logError(result.errorCode) // "network-request-failed"
 }
 is Resource.Loading -> // Loading state
}
```

+

+ number = number,
+ isFlipped = false,
+ isMatched = false,
+ position = index
+ )

+// Score Calculation Helper
+fun calculateScore(
+ matchedPairs: Int,
+ timeUsed: Long,
+ difficulty: GameDifficulty,
+ totalTime: Int
+): Int {
+ val baseScore = matchedPairs * 100
+ val timeBonus = ((totalTime - timeUsed) * 2).coerceAtLeast(0)
+ val difficultyMultiplier = when (difficulty) {
+ GameDifficulty.EASY -> 1.0
+ GameDifficulty.HARD -> 1.5
+ }
+
+ return ((baseScore + timeBonus) * difficultyMultiplier).toInt()

-// Game Creation Helper
-fun createGameCards(difficulty: GameDifficulty): List<GameCard> {
- val numbers = (1..100).shuffled().take(difficulty.uniqueNumbers)
- val doubledNumbers = (numbers + numbers).shuffled()
-
- return doubledNumbers.mapIndexed { index, number ->
- GameCard(
- id = "card_${index}_${System.currentTimeMillis()}",
- number = number,
- isFlipped = false,
- isMatched = false,
- position = index
- )
- }
-}
-
-// Score Calculation Helper
-fun calculateScore(
- matchedPairs: Int,
- timeUsed: Long,
- difficulty: GameDifficulty,
- totalTime: Int
-): Int {
- val baseScore = matchedPairs * 100
- val timeBonus = ((totalTime - timeUsed) * 2).coerceAtLeast(0)
- val difficultyMultiplier = when (difficulty) {
- GameDifficulty.EASY -> 1.0
- GameDifficulty.HARD -> 1.5
- }
-
- return ((baseScore + timeBonus) * difficultyMultiplier).toInt()
-}

@@ -1,1 +1,134 @@
+package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.repository
 
+import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth
+import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.Resource
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.safeCall
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDomain
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDto
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.UserDto
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.User
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.repository.AuthRepository
+import kotlinx.coroutines.channels.awaitClose
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.callbackFlow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.tasks.await
+import javax.inject.Inject
+
+class AuthRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
+ private val firebaseAuth: FirebaseAuth,
+ private val firestore: FirebaseFirestore
+) : AuthRepository {
+
+ companion object {
+ private const val COLLECTION_USERS = "users"
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun signInAnonymously(): Resource<User> = safeCall {
+ val result = firebaseAuth.signInAnonymously().await()
+ val firebaseUser = result.user ?: throw Exception("Anonymous sign in failed")
+
+ val user = User(
+ uid = firebaseUser.uid,
+ displayName = "Anonymous User",
+ isAnonymous = firebaseUser.isAnonymous,
+ createdAt = System.currentTimeMillis(),
+ lastActiveAt = System.currentTimeMillis()
+ )
+
+ // Save user to Firestore
+ firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
+ .document(user.uid)
+ .set(user.toDto())
+ .await()
+
+ user
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun getCurrentUser(): Resource<User?> = safeCall {
+ val firebaseUser = firebaseAuth.currentUser
+ if (firebaseUser != null) {
+ // Try to get user from Firestore first
+ val userDoc = firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
+ .document(firebaseUser.uid)
+ .get()
+ .await()
+
+ if (userDoc.exists()) {
+ userDoc.toObject(UserDto::class.java)?.toDomain()
+ } else {
+ // Create user data from Firebase Auth
+ val user = User(
+ uid = firebaseUser.uid,
+ displayName = firebaseUser.displayName ?: "Anonymous User",
+ isAnonymous = firebaseUser.isAnonymous,
+ createdAt = System.currentTimeMillis(),
+ lastActiveAt = System.currentTimeMillis()
+ )
+
+ // Save to Firestore
+ firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
+ .document(user.uid)
+ .set(user.toDto())
+ .await()
+
+ user
+ }
+ } else {
+ null
+ }
+ }
+
+ override fun getCurrentUserFlow(): Flow<Resource<User?>> = callbackFlow {
+ val authStateListener = FirebaseAuth.AuthStateListener { auth ->
+ val firebaseUser = auth.currentUser
+ if (firebaseUser != null) {
+ // Listen to user document changes
+ val userDocListener = firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
+ .document(firebaseUser.uid)
+ .addSnapshotListener { snapshot, error ->
+ if (error != null) {
+ trySend(Resource.Error(error.message ?: "Unknown error"))
+ return@addSnapshotListener
+ }
+
+ if (snapshot != null && snapshot.exists()) {
+ val user = snapshot.toObject(UserDto::class.java)?.toDomain()
+ trySend(Resource.Success(user))
+ } else {
+ trySend(Resource.Success(null))
+ }
+ }
+
+ awaitClose { userDocListener.remove() }
+ } else {
+ trySend(Resource.Success(null))
+ }
+ }
+
+ firebaseAuth.addAuthStateListener(authStateListener)
+ awaitClose { firebaseAuth.removeAuthStateListener(authStateListener) }
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun updateDisplayName(displayName: String): Resource<Unit> = safeCall {
+ val currentUser = firebaseAuth.currentUser
+ ?: throw Exception("User not authenticated")
+
+ // Update in Firestore
+ firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
+ .document(currentUser.uid)
+ .update(
+ "displayName", displayName,
+ "lastActiveAt", System.currentTimeMillis()
+ )
+ .await()
+ }
+
+ override suspend fun signOut(): Resource<Unit> = safeCall {
+ firebaseAuth.signOut()
+ }
+
+ override fun isUserSignedIn(): Boolean {
+ return firebaseAuth.currentUser != null
+ }
+}

### **Çözüm: Anonymous Authentication**

✅ **Firebase Anonymous Auth** ile:
- User authentication olmadan veri kaydı sorununu çözdük
- Her kullanıcı otomatik olarak anonymous user olarak sign in olacak
- UID ile veri kaydetme/okuma güvenli hale geldi
- İsteyen daha sonra gerçek hesap da oluşturabilir

### **Yapı:**

1. **User Models**: `User` domain, `UserDto` data layer
2. **AuthRepository**: Anonymous sign in, user management
3. **SafeCall Integration**: Professional error handling
4. **Firestore Integration**: User data storage

### **Kullanım:**

```kotlin
// Oyun başında
authRepository.signInAnonymously() // Otomatik anonymous user

// Score kaydetme - artık user UID ile
gameScoreRepository.saveScore(score.copy(userId = currentUser.uid))

// Settings - user specific
gameSettingsRepository.saveSettings(settings, currentUser.uid)
```

1. **Güvenli**: Firebase rules ile user-specific data
2. **Basit**: Kullanıcı kayıt/giriş gerektirmez
3. **Scalable**: İleriye dönük real auth eklenebilir
4. **Professional**: Industry standard approach

package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper

import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orEmpty
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orFalse
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orTrue
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orZero
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameCardDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameScoreDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameSettingsDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.UserDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameCard
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameDifficulty
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameScore
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameSettings
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.User

// GameScore Mappers
fun GameScoreDto.toDomain(): GameScore {
 return GameScore(
 id = id.orEmpty(),
 playerName = playerName.orEmpty(),
 score = score.orZero(),
 difficulty = when (difficulty.orEmpty()) {
 "HARD" -> GameDifficulty.HARD
 else -> GameDifficulty.EASY
 },
 gameTime = gameTime.orZero(),
 completedTime = completedTime.orZero(),
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted.orFalse()
 )
}

fun GameScore.toDto(): GameScoreDto {
 return GameScoreDto(
 id = id,
 playerName = playerName,
 score = score,
 difficulty = difficulty.name,
 gameTime = gameTime,
 completedTime = completedTime,
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted
 )
}

fun List<GameScoreDto>.toDomainList(): List<GameScore> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameScore>.toDtoList(): List<GameScoreDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// GameSettings Mappers
fun GameSettingsDto.toDomain(): GameSettings {
 return GameSettings(
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme.orFalse(),
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled.orTrue(),
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit ?: 60,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName.orEmpty()
 )
}

fun GameSettings.toDto(): GameSettingsDto {
 return GameSettingsDto(
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme,
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled,
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName
 )
}

// GameCard Mappers
fun GameCardDto.toDomain(): GameCard {
 return GameCard(
 id = id.orEmpty(),
 number = number.orZero(),
 isFlipped = isFlipped.orFalse(),
 isMatched = isMatched.orFalse(),
 position = position.orZero()
 )
}

fun GameCard.toDto(): GameCardDto {
 return GameCardDto(
 id = id,
 number = number,
 isFlipped = isFlipped,
 isMatched = isMatched,
 position = position
 )
}

fun List<GameCardDto>.toCardDomainList(): List<GameCard> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameCard>.toCardDtoList(): List<GameCardDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// User Mappers
fun UserDto.toDomain(): User {
 return User(
 uid = uid.orEmpty(),
 displayName = displayName.orEmpty(),
 isAnonymous = isAnonymous.orFalse(),
 createdAt = createdAt,
 lastActiveAt = lastActiveAt
 )
}

fun User.toDto(): UserDto {
 return UserDto(
 uid = uid,
 displayName = displayName,
 isAnonymous = isAnonymous,
 createdAt = createdAt,
 lastActiveAt = lastActiveAt
 )
}

// Game Creation Helper
fun createGameCards(difficulty: GameDifficulty): List<GameCard> {
 val numbers = (1..100).shuffled().take(difficulty.uniqueNumbers)
 val doubledNumbers = (numbers + numbers).shuffled()

 return doubledNumbers.mapIndexed { index, number ->
 GameCard(
 id = "card_${index}_${System.currentTimeMillis()}",
 number = number,
 isFlipped = false,
 isMatched = false,
 position = index
 )
 }
}

// Score Calculation Helper
fun calculateScore(
 matchedPairs: Int,
 timeUsed: Long,
 difficulty: GameDifficulty,
 totalTime: Int
): Int {
 val baseScore = matchedPairs * 100
 val timeBonus = ((totalTime - timeUsed) * 2).coerceAtLeast(0)
 val difficultyMultiplier = when (difficulty) {
 GameDifficulty.EASY -> 1.0
 GameDifficulty.HARD -> 1.5
 }

 return ((baseScore + timeBonus) * difficultyMultiplier).toInt()
}

package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper

import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orEmpty
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orFalse
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orTrue
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.orZero
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameCardDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameScoreDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.GameSettingsDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.UserDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameCard
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameDifficulty
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameScore
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.GameSettings
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.User

// GameScore Mappers
fun GameScoreDto.toDomain(): GameScore {
 return GameScore(
 id = id.orEmpty(),
 userId = userId.orEmpty(),
 playerName = playerName.orEmpty(),
 score = score.orZero(),
 difficulty = when (difficulty.orEmpty()) {
 "HARD" -> GameDifficulty.HARD
 else -> GameDifficulty.EASY
 },
 gameTime = gameTime.orZero(),
 completedTime = completedTime.orZero(),
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted.orFalse()
 )
}

fun GameScore.toDto(): GameScoreDto {
 return GameScoreDto(
 id = id,
 userId = userId,
 playerName = playerName,
 score = score,
 difficulty = difficulty.name,
 gameTime = gameTime,
 completedTime = completedTime,
 timestamp = timestamp,
 isCompleted = isCompleted
 )
}

fun List<GameScoreDto>.toDomainList(): List<GameScore> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameScore>.toDtoList(): List<GameScoreDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// GameSettings Mappers
fun GameSettingsDto.toDomain(): GameSettings {
 return GameSettings(
 userId = userId.orEmpty(),
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme.orFalse(),
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled.orTrue(),
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit ?: 60,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName.orEmpty()
 )
}

fun GameSettings.toDto(): GameSettingsDto {
 return GameSettingsDto(
 userId = userId,
 isDarkTheme = isDarkTheme,
 isTimerEnabled = isTimerEnabled,
 gameTimeLimit = gameTimeLimit,
 lastPlayerName = lastPlayerName
 )
}

// GameCard Mappers
fun GameCardDto.toDomain(): GameCard {
 return GameCard(
 id = id.orEmpty(),
 number = number.orZero(),
 isFlipped = isFlipped.orFalse(),
 isMatched = isMatched.orFalse(),
 position = position.orZero()
 )
}

fun GameCard.toDto(): GameCardDto {
 return GameCardDto(
 id = id,
 number = number,
 isFlipped = isFlipped,
 isMatched = isMatched,
 position = position
 )
}

fun List<GameCardDto>.toCardDomainList(): List<GameCard> {
 return map { it.toDomain() }
}

fun List<GameCard>.toCardDtoList(): List<GameCardDto> {
 return map { it.toDto() }
}

// User Mappers
fun UserDto.toDomain(): User {
 return User(
 uid = uid.orEmpty(),
 displayName = displayName.orEmpty(),
 email = email.orEmpty(),
 createdAt = createdAt,
 lastActiveAt = lastActiveAt
 )
}

fun User.toDto(): UserDto {
 return UserDto(
 uid = uid,
 displayName = displayName,
 email = email,
 createdAt = createdAt,
 lastActiveAt = lastActiveAt
 )
}

// Game Creation Helper
fun createGameCards(difficulty: GameDifficulty): List<GameCard> {
 val numbers = (1..100).shuffled().take(difficulty.uniqueNumbers)
 val doubledNumbers = (numbers + numbers).shuffled()

 return doubledNumbers.mapIndexed { index, number ->
 GameCard(
 id = "card_${index}_${System.currentTimeMillis()}",
 number = number,
 isFlipped = false,
 isMatched = false,
 position = index
 )
 }
}

// Score Calculation Helper
fun calculateScore(
 matchedPairs: Int,
 timeUsed: Long,
 difficulty: GameDifficulty,
 totalTime: Int
): Int {
 val baseScore = matchedPairs * 100
 val timeBonus = ((totalTime - timeUsed) * 2).coerceAtLeast(0)
 val difficultyMultiplier = when (difficulty) {
 GameDifficulty.EASY -> 1.0
 GameDifficulty.HARD -> 1.5
 }

 return ((baseScore + timeBonus) * difficultyMultiplier).toInt()
}

package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.repository

import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth
import com.google.firebase.auth.UserProfileChangeRequest
import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.Resource
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.safeCall
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDomain
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.mapper.toDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.data.model.UserDto
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.User
import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.repository.AuthRepository
import kotlinx.coroutines.channels.awaitClose
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.callbackFlow
import kotlinx.coroutines.tasks.await
import javax.inject.Inject

class AuthRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
 private val firebaseAuth: FirebaseAuth,
 private val firestore: FirebaseFirestore
) : AuthRepository {

 companion object {
 private const val COLLECTION_USERS = "users"
 }

 override suspend fun signInWithEmailAndPassword(email: String, password: String): Resource<User> = safeCall {
 val result = firebaseAuth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(email, password).await()
 val firebaseUser = result.user ?: throw Exception("Sign in failed")

 // Get user from Firestore
 val userDoc = firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(firebaseUser.uid)
 .get()
 .await()

 if (userDoc.exists()) {
 userDoc.toObject(UserDto::class.java)?.toDomain()
 ?: throw Exception("User data not found")
 } else {
 val user = User(
 uid = firebaseUser.uid,
 displayName = firebaseUser.displayName ?: "User",
 email = firebaseUser.email ?: email,
 createdAt = System.currentTimeMillis(),
 lastActiveAt = System.currentTimeMillis()
 )

 firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(user.uid)
 .set(user.toDto())
 .await()

 user
 }
 }

 override suspend fun signUpWithEmailAndPassword(
 email: String,
 password: String,
 displayName: String
 ): Resource<User> = safeCall {
 val result = firebaseAuth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email, password).await()
 val firebaseUser = result.user ?: throw Exception("Sign up failed")

 val profileUpdates = UserProfileChangeRequest.Builder()
 .setDisplayName(displayName)
 .build()
 firebaseUser.updateProfile(profileUpdates).await()

 // Create user in Firestore
 val user = User(
 uid = firebaseUser.uid,
 displayName = displayName,
 email = email,
 createdAt = System.currentTimeMillis(),
 lastActiveAt = System.currentTimeMillis()
 )

 firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(user.uid)
 .set(user.toDto())
 .await()

 user
 }

 override suspend fun getCurrentUser(): Resource<User?> = safeCall {
 val firebaseUser = firebaseAuth.currentUser
 if (firebaseUser != null) {
 // Try to get user from Firestore first
 val userDoc = firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(firebaseUser.uid)
 .get()
 .await()

 if (userDoc.exists()) {
 userDoc.toObject(UserDto::class.java)?.toDomain()
 } else {
 // Create user data from Firebase Auth
 val user = User(
 uid = firebaseUser.uid,
 displayName = firebaseUser.displayName ?: "User",
 email = firebaseUser.email ?: "",
 createdAt = System.currentTimeMillis(),
 lastActiveAt = System.currentTimeMillis()
 )

 // Save to Firestore
 firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(user.uid)
 .set(user.toDto())
 .await()

 user
 }
 } else {
 null
 }
 }

 override fun getCurrentUserFlow(): Flow<Resource<User?>> = callbackFlow {
 val authStateListener = FirebaseAuth.AuthStateListener { auth ->
 val firebaseUser = auth.currentUser
 if (firebaseUser != null) {
 // Listen to user document changes
 val userDocListener = firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(firebaseUser.uid)
 .addSnapshotListener { snapshot, error ->
 if (error != null) {
 trySend(Resource.Error(error.message ?: "Unknown error"))
 return@addSnapshotListener
 }

 if (snapshot != null && snapshot.exists()) {
 val user = snapshot.toObject(UserDto::class.java)?.toDomain()
 trySend(Resource.Success(user))
 } else {
 trySend(Resource.Success(null))
 }
 }
 } else {
 trySend(Resource.Success(null))
 }
 }

 firebaseAuth.addAuthStateListener(authStateListener)
 awaitClose {
 firebaseAuth.removeAuthStateListener(authStateListener)
 }
 }

 override suspend fun updateDisplayName(displayName: String): Resource<Unit> = safeCall {
 val currentUser = firebaseAuth.currentUser
 ?: throw Exception("User not authenticated")

 // Update in Firestore
 firestore.collection(COLLECTION_USERS)
 .document(currentUser.uid)
 .update(
 "displayName", displayName,
 "lastActiveAt", System.currentTimeMillis()
 )
 .await()
 }

 override suspend fun signOut(): Resource<Unit> = safeCall {
 firebaseAuth.signOut()
 }

 override fun isUserSignedIn(): Boolean {
 return firebaseAuth.currentUser != null
 }
}
```

package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common

enum class FirebaseErrorCode(val code: String, val message: String) {
 // Network Errors
 NETWORK_ERROR("network-request-failed", "İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edin"),
 TIMEOUT("timeout", "İşlem zaman aşımına uğradı"),
 UNAVAILABLE("unavailable", "Servis şu anda kullanılamıyor"),

 // Permission Errors
 PERMISSION_DENIED("permission-denied", "Bu işlem için yetkiniz bulunmuyor"),
 UNAUTHENTICATED("unauthenticated", "Oturum açmanız gerekiyor"),

 // Data Errors
 NOT_FOUND("not-found", "İstenen veri bulunamadı"),
 ALREADY_EXISTS("already-exists", "Bu veri zaten mevcut"),
 FAILED_PRECONDITION("failed-precondition", "İşlem koşulları sağlanamadı"),
 OUT_OF_RANGE("out-of-range", "Veri aralık dışında"),
 DATA_LOSS("data-loss", "Veri kaybı oluştu"),

 // Resource Errors
 RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED("resource-exhausted", "Kaynak limiti aşıldı"),
 QUOTA_EXCEEDED("quota-exceeded", "Kullanım kotası aşıldı"),

 // Internal Errors
 INTERNAL("internal", "Sunucu hatası oluştu"),
 UNKNOWN("unknown", "Bilinmeyen bir hata oluştu"),
 INVALID_ARGUMENT("invalid-argument", "Geçersiz parametre"),
 CANCELLED("cancelled", "İşlem iptal edildi"),
 DEADLINE_EXCEEDED("deadline-exceeded", "İşlem zaman aşımına uğradı"),

 // Custom App Errors
 GAME_NOT_FOUND("game-not-found", "Oyun bulunamadı"),
 SCORE_SAVE_FAILED("score-save-failed", "Skor kaydedilemedi"),
 SETTINGS_LOAD_FAILED("settings-load-failed", "Ayarlar yüklenemedi"),
 INVALID_GAME_STATE("invalid-game-state", "Geçersiz oyun durumu");

 companion object {
 private fun fromCode(code: String?): FirebaseErrorCode {
 return entries.find { it.code == code } ?: UNKNOWN
 }

 fun getMessageByCode(code: String?): String {
 return fromCode(code).message
 }
 }
}

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/common/SafeCall.kt, lines=ALL(1-123)
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common

import com.google.firebase.FirebaseException
import com.google.firebase.FirebaseNetworkException
import com.google.firebase.FirebaseTooManyRequestsException
import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestoreException
import kotlinx.coroutines.TimeoutCancellationException
import kotlinx.coroutines.withTimeout
import java.io.IOException
import java.net.UnknownHostException

object SafeCall {

 suspend fun <T> execute(
 timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
 operation: suspend () -> T
 ): Resource<T> {
 return try {
 val result = withTimeout(timeoutMillis) {
 operation()
 }
 Resource.Success(result)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 handleException(e)
 }
 }

 fun <T> executeSync(operation: () -> T): Resource<T> {
 return try {
 val result = operation()
 Resource.Success(result)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 handleException(e)
 }
 }

 private fun <T> handleException(exception: Exception): Resource.Error<T> {
 return when (exception) {
 // Firebase Specific Errors
 is FirebaseFirestoreException -> {
 val errorCode = mapFirestoreErrorCode(exception.code)
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.getMessageByCode(errorCode.code),
 errorCode = errorCode.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseNetworkException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseTooManyRequestsException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
 )
 }

 // Network Errors
 is UnknownHostException, is IOException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
 )
 }

 // Timeout Errors
 is TimeoutCancellationException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.code
 )
 }

 // Generic Errors
 else -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = exception.message ?: FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
 )
 }
 }
 }

 private fun mapFirestoreErrorCode(code: FirebaseFirestoreException.Code): FirebaseErrorCode {
 return when (code) {
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.PERMISSION_DENIED -> FirebaseErrorCode.PERMISSION_DENIED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.NOT_FOUND -> FirebaseErrorCode.NOT_FOUND
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.ALREADY_EXISTS -> FirebaseErrorCode.ALREADY_EXISTS
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.FAILED_PRECONDITION -> FirebaseErrorCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.OUT_OF_RANGE -> FirebaseErrorCode.OUT_OF_RANGE
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DATA_LOSS -> FirebaseErrorCode.DATA_LOSS
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED -> FirebaseErrorCode.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INTERNAL -> FirebaseErrorCode.INTERNAL
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT -> FirebaseErrorCode.INVALID_ARGUMENT
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.CANCELLED -> FirebaseErrorCode.CANCELLED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED -> FirebaseErrorCode.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAUTHENTICATED -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAUTHENTICATED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAVAILABLE -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAVAILABLE
 else -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN
 }
 }
}

// Extension functions for easier usage
suspend inline fun <T> safeCall(
 timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
 crossinline operation: suspend () -> T
): Resource<T> = SafeCall.execute(timeoutMillis) { operation() }

inline fun <T> safeCallSync(
 crossinline operation: () -> T
): Resource<T> = SafeCall.executeSync { operation() }
```

+package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.usecase
 
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.Resource
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.User
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.repository.AuthRepository
+import javax.inject.Inject
+
+class SignInUseCase @Inject constructor(
+ private val authRepository: AuthRepository
+) {
+ suspend operator fun invoke(email: String, password: String): Resource<User> {
+ // Basic validation
+ if (email.isBlank()) {
+ return Resource.Error("E-posta adresi boş olamaz", errorCode = "missing-email")
+ }
+
+ if (password.isBlank()) {
+ return Resource.Error("Şifre boş olamaz", errorCode = "missing-password")
+ }
+
+ if (!android.util.Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(email).matches()) {
+ return Resource.Error("Geçersiz e-posta adresi", errorCode = "invalid-email")
+ }
+
+ return authRepository.signInWithEmailAndPassword(email, password)
+ }
+}

+package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.usecase
 
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common.Resource
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.model.User
+import com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.domain.repository.AuthRepository
+import javax.inject.Inject
+
+class SignUpUseCase @Inject constructor(
+ private val authRepository: AuthRepository
+) {
+ suspend operator fun invoke(
+ email: String,
+ password: String,
+ displayName: String
+ ): Resource<User> {
+ // Basic validation
+ if (email.isBlank()) {
+ return Resource.Error("E-posta adresi boş olamaz", errorCode = "missing-email")
+ }
+
+ if (password.isBlank()) {
+ return Resource.Error("Şifre boş olamaz", errorCode = "missing-password")
+ }
+
+ if (displayName.isBlank()) {
+ return Resource.Error("İsim boş olamaz", errorCode = "missing-display-name")
+ }
+
+ if (!android.util.Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(email).matches()) {
+ return Resource.Error("Geçersiz e-posta adresi", errorCode = "invalid-email")
+ }
+
+ if (password.length < 6) {
+ return Resource.Error("Şifre en az 6 karakter olmalı", errorCode = "weak-password")
+ }
+
+ return authRepository.signUpWithEmailAndPassword(email, password, displayName)
+ }
+}

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"## ✅ Firebase Authentication Error Handling Tamamlandı!

### **Eklenen Özellikler:**

1. **Comprehensive Firebase Auth Error Codes**:
 - `AUTH_INVALID_EMAIL` - "Geçersiz e-posta adresi"
 - `AUTH_WRONG_PASSWORD` - "Hatalı şifre"
 - `AUTH_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE` - "Bu e-posta adresi zaten kullanımda"
 - `AUTH_WEAK_PASSWORD` - "Şifre çok zayıf (en az 6 karakter olmalı)"
 - `AUTH_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS` - "Çok fazla deneme yapıldı"
 - Ve daha fazlası...

2. **SafeCall Firebase Auth Integration**:
 - `FirebaseAuthException` handling
 - Automatic error code mapping
 - Turkish user-friendly messages

3. **Authentication Use Cases**:
 - `SignInUseCase` - Validation + Sign in
 - `SignUpUseCase` - Validation + Registration
 - `GetCurrentUserUseCase` - Current user management

### **Kullanım Örneği:**

```kotlin
// UI'da error handling
when (val result = signInUseCase(email, password)) {
 is Resource.Success -> {
 // User signed in successfully
 navigateToMainScreen(result.data)
 }
 is Resource.Error -> {
 when (result.errorCode) {
 "wrong-password" -> showError("Hatalı şifre")
 "user-not-found" -> showError("Kullanıcı bulunamadı")
 "invalid-email" -> showError("Geçersiz e-posta adresi")
 "too-many-requests" -> showError("Çok fazla deneme, daha sonra tekrar deneyin")
 else -> showError(result.message)
 }
 }
 is Resource.Loading -> showLoading()
}
```

### **Avantajlar:**

1. **User Experience**: Türkçe, anlaşılır hata mesajları
2. **Comprehensive**: Tüm Firebase Auth hataları covered
3. **Consistent**: SafeCall ile unified error handling
4. **Validation**: Client-side validation + server-side errors
5. **Professional**: Industry standard approach

Şimdi GameSettings repository'yi de user-specific yapalım mı?"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/oguzhanozgokce/androidbootcampfinalproject/common/SafeCall.kt, lines=ALL(1-159)
package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.common

import com.google.firebase.FirebaseException
import com.google.firebase.FirebaseNetworkException
import com.google.firebase.FirebaseTooManyRequestsException
import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuthException
import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestoreException
import kotlinx.coroutines.TimeoutCancellationException
import kotlinx.coroutines.withTimeout
import java.io.IOException
import java.net.UnknownHostException

object SafeCall {

 suspend fun <T> execute(
 timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
 operation: suspend () -> T
 ): Resource<T> {
 return try {
 val result = withTimeout(timeoutMillis) {
 operation()
 }
 Resource.Success(result)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 handleException(e)
 }
 }

 fun <T> executeSync(operation: () -> T): Resource<T> {
 return try {
 val result = operation()
 Resource.Success(result)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 handleException(e)
 }
 }

 private fun <T> handleException(exception: Exception): Resource.Error<T> {
 return when (exception) {
 // Firebase Specific Errors
 is FirebaseFirestoreException -> {
 val errorCode = mapFirestoreErrorCode(exception.code)
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.getMessageByCode(errorCode.code),
 errorCode = errorCode.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseNetworkException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseTooManyRequestsException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.QUOTA_EXCEEDED.code
 )
 }

 is FirebaseException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
 )
 }

 // Firebase Auth Errors
 is FirebaseAuthException -> {
 val errorCode = mapFirebaseAuthErrorCode(exception.errorCode)
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.getMessageByCode(errorCode.code),
 errorCode = errorCode.code
 )
 }

 // Network Errors
 is UnknownHostException, is IOException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.NETWORK_ERROR.code
 )
 }

 // Timeout Errors
 is TimeoutCancellationException -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.TIMEOUT.code
 )
 }

 // Generic Errors
 else -> {
 Resource.Error(
 message = exception.message ?: FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.message,
 errorCode = FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN.code
 )
 }
 }
 }

 private fun mapFirestoreErrorCode(code: FirebaseFirestoreException.Code): FirebaseErrorCode {
 return when (code) {
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.PERMISSION_DENIED -> FirebaseErrorCode.PERMISSION_DENIED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.NOT_FOUND -> FirebaseErrorCode.NOT_FOUND
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.ALREADY_EXISTS -> FirebaseErrorCode.ALREADY_EXISTS
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.FAILED_PRECONDITION -> FirebaseErrorCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.OUT_OF_RANGE -> FirebaseErrorCode.OUT_OF_RANGE
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DATA_LOSS -> FirebaseErrorCode.DATA_LOSS
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED -> FirebaseErrorCode.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INTERNAL -> FirebaseErrorCode.INTERNAL
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT -> FirebaseErrorCode.INVALID_ARGUMENT
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.CANCELLED -> FirebaseErrorCode.CANCELLED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED -> FirebaseErrorCode.DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAUTHENTICATED -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAUTHENTICATED
 FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.UNAVAILABLE -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNAVAILABLE
 else -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN
 }
 }

 private fun mapFirebaseAuthErrorCode(code: String): FirebaseErrorCode {
 return when (code) {
 "INVALID_EMAIL" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_INVALID_EMAIL
 "WRONG_PASSWORD" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_WRONG_PASSWORD
 "EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE
 "USER_NOT_FOUND" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_USER_NOT_FOUND
 "USER_DISABLED" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_USER_DISABLED
 "TOO_MANY_REQUESTS" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
 "OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED
 "WEAK_PASSWORD" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_WEAK_PASSWORD
 "INVALID_CREDENTIAL" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIAL
 "USER_TOKEN_EXPIRED" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_USER_TOKEN_EXPIRED
 "INVALID_USER_TOKEN" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_INVALID_USER_TOKEN
 "REQUIRES_RECENT_LOGIN" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_REQUIRES_RECENT_LOGIN
 "ACCOUNT_EXISTS_WITH_DIFFERENT_CREDENTIAL" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_ACCOUNT_EXISTS_WITH_DIFFERENT_CREDENTIAL
 "CREDENTIAL_ALREADY_IN_USE" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_CREDENTIAL_ALREADY_IN_USE
 "INVALID_VERIFICATION_CODE" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_INVALID_VERIFICATION_CODE
 "INVALID_VERIFICATION_ID" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_INVALID_VERIFICATION_ID
 "EXPIRED_ACTION_CODE" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_EXPIRED_ACTION_CODE
 "INVALID_ACTION_CODE" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_INVALID_ACTION_CODE
 "MISSING_EMAIL" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_MISSING_EMAIL
 "MISSING_PASSWORD" -> FirebaseErrorCode.AUTH_MISSING_PASSWORD
 else -> FirebaseErrorCode.UNKNOWN
 }
 }
}

// Extension functions for easier usage
suspend inline fun <T> safeCall(
 timeoutMillis: Long = 30000L,
 crossinline operation: suspend () -> T
): Resource<T> = SafeCall.execute(timeoutMillis) { operation() }

inline fun <T> safeCallSync(
 crossinline operation: () -> T
): Resource<T> = SafeCall.executeSync { operation() }

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"## ✅ Tutarlı Error Handling ve User-Specific Repository Sistemi Tamamlandı!

### **Düzeltmeler:**

1. **SafeCall Tutarlılığı**:
 - `FirebaseFirestoreException.code` → Enum (type-safe)
 - `FirebaseAuthException.errorCode` → String (Firebase SDK tasarımı)
 - İkisi de açıklamalarla belirtildi
 - Firebase Auth için hem `ERROR_` prefix'li hem de legacy format destekleniyor

2. **AuthRepository SafeCall Dönüşümü**:
 - Tüm metodlar artık `safeCall` kullanıyor
 - Manuel try-catch kaldırıldı
 - Automatic error handling ve Turkish messages

3. **GameSettings User-Specific**:
 - Document ID artık `userId` 
 - Tüm metodlar user-specific
 - Default settings userId ile oluşturuluyor

### **Fark Açıklaması:**

```kotlin
// Firestore - Type Safe Enum
FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.PERMISSION_DENIED
FirebaseFirestoreException.Code.NOT_FOUND

// Auth - String Based (Firebase SDK design) 
"ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL"
"ERROR_WRONG_PASSWORD"
"USER_NOT_FOUND" // Legacy format
```

### **Firestore Structure:**

```
game_settings/
 └── {userId}/ ← User ID as document ID
 ├── userId: String
 ├── isDarkTheme: Boolean
 ├── isTimerEnabled: Boolean
 └── ...

game_scores/
 └── {scoreId}/
 ├── userId: String ← For filtering
 ├── score: Int
 └── ...
```

### **Usage:**

```kotlin
// User-specific operations
val currentUser = getCurrentUserUseCase()
gameSettingsRepository.getSettingsByUserId(currentUser.uid)
gameScoreRepository.getAllScoresByUserId(currentUser.uid)

// Automatic error handling with Turkish messages
when (result) {
 is Resource.Error -> showError(result.message) // "Geçersiz e-posta adresi"
}
```

package com.oguzhanozgokce.androidbootcampfinalproject.ui.theme

import android.os.Build
import androidx.compose.foundation.isSystemInDarkTheme
import androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme
import androidx.compose.material3.darkColorScheme
import androidx.compose.material3.dynamicDarkColorScheme
import androidx.compose.material3.dynamicLightColorScheme
import androidx.compose.material3.lightColorScheme
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext

private val DarkColorScheme = darkColorScheme(
 primary = Purple80,
 secondary = PurpleGrey80,
 tertiary = Pink80
)

private val LightColorScheme = lightColorScheme(
 primary = Purple40,
 secondary = PurpleGrey40,
 tertiary = Pink40

 /* Other default colors to override
 background = Color(0xFFFFFBFE),
 surface = Color(0xFFFFFBFE),
 onPrimary = Color.White,
 onSecondary = Color.White,
 onTertiary = Color.White,
 onBackground = Color(0xFF1C1B1F),
 onSurface = Color(0xFF1C1B1F),
 */
)

@Composable
fun MyappTheme(
 darkTheme: Boolean = isSystemInDarkTheme(),
 // Dynamic color is available on Android 12+
 dynamicColor: Boolean = true,
 content: @Composable () -> Unit
) {
 val colorScheme = when {
 dynamicColor && Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S -> {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 if (darkTheme) dynamicDarkColorScheme(context) else dynamicLightColorScheme(context)
 }

 darkTheme -> DarkColorScheme
 else -> LightColorScheme
 }

 MaterialTheme(
 colorScheme = colorScheme,
 typography = Typography,
 content = content
 )
}
```

+import androidx.compose.ui.text.input.VisualTransformation
+import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
+import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
 
 @Composable
 fun ABTextField(
-
+ value: String,
+ onValueChange: (String) -> Unit,
+ modifier: Modifier = Modifier,
+ label: String? = null,
+ placeholder: String = "",
+ leadingIcon: ImageVector? = null,
+ trailingIcon: ImageVector? = null,
+ onTrailingIconClick: (() -> Unit)? = null,
+ isError: Boolean = false,
+ errorMessage: String? = null,
+ enabled: Boolean = true,
+ readOnly: Boolean = false,
+ singleLine: Boolean = true,
+ maxLines: Int = if (singleLine) 1 else Int.MAX_VALUE,
+ visualTransformation: VisualTransformation = VisualTransformation.None,
+ keyboardOptions: KeyboardOptions = KeyboardOptions.Default,
+ keyboardActions: KeyboardActions = KeyboardActions.Default,
+ interactionSource: MutableInteractionSource = remember { MutableInteractionSource() }
 ) {
+ var isFocused by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 
+ val borderColor by animateColorAsState(
+ targetValue = when {
+ isError -> MaterialTheme.colorScheme.error
+ isFocused -> MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
+ else -> MaterialTheme.colorScheme.outline
+ },
+ animationSpec = tween(150),
+ label = "borderColor"
+ )
+
+ val backgroundColor by animateColorAsState(
+ targetValue = if (isFocused) {
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.surface
+ } else {
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.outlineVariant
+ },
+ animationSpec = tween(150),
+ label = "backgroundColor"
+ )
+
+ Column(modifier = modifier) {
+ // Label
+ label?.let {
+ Text(
+ text = it,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium.copy(
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
+ color = if (isError) {
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.error
+ } else {
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurface
+ }
+ ),
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 4.dp)
+ )
+ }
+
+ // TextField Container
+ Box(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
+ .background(backgroundColor)
+ .border(
+ width = if (isFocused) 2.dp else 1.dp,
+ color = borderColor,
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
+ )
+ .padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 14.dp)
+ ) {
+ BasicTextField(
+ value = value,
+ onValueChange = onValueChange,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .onFocusChanged { focusState ->
+ isFocused = focusState.isFocused
+ },
+ enabled = enabled,
+ readOnly = readOnly,
+ textStyle = TextStyle(
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurface,
+ fontSize = 16.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal
+ ),
+ keyboardOptions = keyboardOptions,
+ keyboardActions = keyboardActions,
+ singleLine = singleLine,
+ maxLines = maxLines,
+ visualTransformation = visualTransformation,
+ interactionSource = interactionSource,
+ cursorBrush = SolidColor(MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary),
+ decorationBox = { innerTextField ->
+ androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ ) {
+ // Leading Icon
+ leadingIcon?.let { icon ->
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = icon,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ tint = if (isFocused) {
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
+ } else {
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ },
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .size(20.dp)
+ .padding(end = 12.dp)
+ )
+ }
+
+ // TextField Content
+ Box(
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
+ ) {
+ if (value.isEmpty() && placeholder.isNotEmpty()) {
+ Text(
+ text = placeholder,
+ style = TextStyle(
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant,
+ fontSize = 16.sp
+ )
+ )
+ }
+ innerTextField()
+ }
+
+ // Trailing Icon
+ trailingIcon?.let { icon ->
+ androidx.compose.foundation.clickable.clickable(
+ enabled = onTrailingIconClick != null
+ ) {
+ onTrailingIconClick?.invoke()
+ }
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = icon,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .size(20.dp)
+ .padding(start = 12.dp)
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Error Message
+ if (isError && errorMessage != null) {
+ Text(
+ text = errorMessage,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall.copy(
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.error
+ ),
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(top = 4.dp, start = 4.dp)
+ )
+ }
+ }
 }
